entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generic Blazor component can't correctly infer its types #42141
  • Project templates are creating an "http" profile even when auth options are selected that require https #42138
    7.0-preview6
  • EndpointBuilder.ServiceProvider should be non-nullabe and renamed to ApplicationServices #42137
  • Quarantine Http2WebSocketTests.HEADERS_Received_SecondRequest_Accepted #42133
  • Add path based exclusions to HSTS and Rewriter middleware #42132
    Backlog
  • Wrap token column in `dotnet user-jwts list` output #42130
  • The type or namespace name does not exist in the namespace '__Blazor #42129
  • The model item passed into the ViewDataDictionary is of type X but this ViewDataDictionary instance requires a model item of type X. #42127
  • Razor Contextual Components #42126
  • Collection Data Binding In Blazor Server #42124

Closed

  • Introduce interface with static abstract BindAsync method for custom bound parameters of route handler delegates #40927
    7.0-preview6
  • Quarantine GetWithRouteParameter_WriteMultiple_CancellationBefore_CallCanceled #41629
    Test failures
  • Logging intermittently stops until website is recycled. #42017
  • Signalr AddToGroupAsync possible race condition #38531
    7.0-preview6
  • Asp.Net Core identity with source generators #41125
    Discussions
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #42096
  • Perf improvement: single_query #42120
  • Remove explicit parameterName from calls to ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull where it can be inferred via the CallerMemberNameAttribute #42018
  • Can't run Blazor wasm hosted solution from VS 2022 with a custom environment #42081
  • Out of memory issue throws when rendering the 2040 * 2040 elements. #42108
  • Intermittent `NullReferenceException` from `DefaultHttpRequest.Form` #42100
  • .NET 6 Web API not working without .NET Core 2.1 Runtime in the server. #41837
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, fortunes_nodejs #42095
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #42104
  • Complex architecture using DI scoped service #42103
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix branch names again #42142
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.7
  • [main] Work around #41937 and stop skipping tests #42140
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Work around #41937 and stop skipping tests #42139
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Fix branch names again #42131
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix up user-jwts interactions #42125
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts

Merged

  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview6
  • Unquarantine GetWithRouteParameter_WriteMultiple_CancellationBefore_CallCanceled #42136
    area-grpc, 7.0-preview6
  • Add issue template link to API Review process doc #42135
    7.0-preview6
  • Quarantine HEADERS_Received_SecondRequest_Accepted #42134
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix AddToGroupAsync race with OnDisconnectedAsync #42117
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview6
  • [release/6.0] Fix branch name in mirror pipeline #42122
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.7
  • Fix branch name in mirror pipeline #42121
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Remove explicit parameterName #42026
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • [WIP] Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime
  • Empty Blazor Server Project Template #42079
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Update project templates to replace DateTime with DateOnly #42084
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • [release/3.1] Update SPA template JS dependencies #42060
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure
  • Add support for reading default scheme from config #41987
    area-security
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
